rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with North-facing entry door. The design uses natural lighting, minimalistic Scandinavian style elements and includes a small storage area. Vastu principles ensure a clear path for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open plan living-dining space with ample seating area, accentuated by neutral color palette and natural wood finishes. Large windows to allow natural light and a view of the garden and terrace.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Modern kitchenette designed in Scandinavian style using energy-efficient appliances, open layout for easy access from the dining area with integrated storage solutions. Incorporates natural lighting to meet Vastu principles for balance.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact, efficient bathroom designed with neutral tones and minimalist fixtures. Includes essential amenities and adheres to local building codes and safety standards.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious studio bedroom combining sleeping area and workspace. Features ample storage options, subtle Scandinavian design aesthetics, with emphasis on natural light through strategically placed windows.

openings.description: The main entrance door is North-facing to align with Vastu principles for positivity and energy flow. It features a minimalist Scandinavian design.
Large windows providing abundant natural light while maintaining privacy and adhering to local architectural norms.
A staircase from the ground floor leads to a fully accessible rooftop terrace, offering views of the surroundings and space for relaxation.
